ABOUT UWIN

UWIN is the leading online gambling company in Asia that offers variety of fun and exciting gaming products from eSportsbook, Sportsbook, in-play sports betting, live casino, slot games, lottery products and more! To offer our members the latest online betting technology and the best gaming experience, UWIN cooperates with variety of prominent gaming platform which includes Inplay Matrix, Pinnacle, IBC Bet, Asia Gaming, DongSen Lottery, KaiYuan & LeYou Board Game. We offer an average of 10,000 different eSports & Sports games every month and worldwide competitions in Uwin's eSportsbook, while a total of over 100 casino games from a variety of baccarat, slots, roulette and other casino games can be played in Live Casino.

CREDIBILITY

UWIN is owned by DongSen Group., which is fully registered gambling and entertainment company founded in June, 2009. Our brand holds gambling license from Philippine Amusement and Gaming Corporation, First Cagayan Leisure & Resort Corporation. Being certified and governed by credible gambling bodies in above assures all members that join and play with UWIN conforms to standards set of regulatory in internet gambling, safe and stable platform for our current and future members' gaming pleasure.

CUSTOMER SERVICES

UWIN is available for China and South East Asian markets including Thailand, and soon will include Vietnam. We're proud to say that we offer efficient and dedicated customer support, available 24/7 for any of our customers' concerns. We give high priority to ensure a secured payment system and provide personal information confidentiality.

UWIN'S RESPONSIBLE GAMBLING POLICY

UWIN is committed to endorsing responsible wagering as well as promoting the awareness of problem gambling and improving prevention, intervention and treatment. UWIN's Responsible Gambling Policy sets out its commitment to minimizing the negative effects of problem gambling and to promoting responsible gambling practices. We believe it is our responsibility to you, our customers, to ensure that you enjoy your wagering experience on our site, while remaining fully aware of the social and financial harms associated with problem gambling. In order to assist our players in gambling responsibly, we ensure that all our staff receive responsible gambling awareness. Please contact our Help desk if you require further information or assistance.

MAINTAINING CONTROL

Whilst the majority of our customers gamble within their means for some it can be more difficult. In order to maintain control of your gambling habits we would like you to bear in mind the following points:
1) Gambling should be done in moderation and undertaken as a form of leisure not as a genuine way of making money
2) Avoid chasing losses
3) Only gamble when you can cover the losses
4) Keep track of the time and monitor the amount of money you spend
If you need to talk to someone about any concerns you may have with your gambling, please contact one of the organisations which we have detailed below.

UNDERAGE GAMBLING

It is illegal for anyone under the age of 18 to open an account or to gamble on UWIN. UWIN takes its responsibilities in this regard very seriously. We carry out age verification checks on all customers who use payment mechanisms which are available to under 18's and additionally perform random age verification checks on customers using other forms of funding mechanisms.

PLEASE NOTE THAT ANYONE UNDER THE AGE OF 18 FOUND TO BE USING THIS SITE WILL HAVE ANY WINNINGS FORFEITED AND MAY ALSO BE REPORTED TO THE POLICE.

BETTING LIMITS

At UWIN.com, we recognize and acknowledge the importance of imposing transfer limits to seek to curb online gambling problems with specific games/ products. We will therefore seek to provide you with instruments to control the amount of money you transfer to a particular wallet for a set of games/ products. You will be able set your own Transfer Limits for different wallets. Select Transfer Limits from the Account Management Menu and tick on the Active box. Afterwards, key in your desired maximum Transfer Limit on the Field for the wallet you wish to specify and click on Update. Upon setting your Transfer Limit, you will receive a notification in your email which you need to confirm before your request is processed. Please note that the amount which you have keyed in will be the amount of the maximum transfer which you can make to a particular wallet in a seven (7) day consecutive period.

To assist you in setting which limits are right for you, try to ponder on these thoughts:

- Establish what constitutes an acceptable loss before starting to gamble.
- Note how often you play.
- Note how long you play during each gaming session.
- Use your reflections to determine how much you would like to allow yourself to wager daily, weekly, or monthly.

Definitions

The following provisions define the terms and conditions that govern your use of, access to and participation in any "play for real" services provided by, Welton Holdings Ltd (collectively referred to as "UWIN", "we", "our" or "us" as the context requires) from time to time (the "Service(s)") on and/or through the website at www.uwin.com, and any other website operated by Dongsen LTD (the "Website(s)"). "Betting" or "bet(s)" for the purpose of these Terms and Conditions include, without limitation, wagering, gaming and gambling conducted in relation to any and/or all of the Service(s) offered on the Website(s);

"Device(s)" mean any application access devices, including but not limited to personal computers, laptops, mobile phones, personal digital assistants, PDA phones, hand-held devices employed for the use of and access to the Website(s) and participation in the Services;

Placement of Bets and Bet Acceptance Procedure

We accept bets for games, sporting and other events that are advertised on the Website(s) and/or through the Device(s) from time to time. All such bets are subject to the relevant House Betting Rules applicable to each event or game, and to these Terms and Conditions. If a manifest error or mistake occurs or an incorrect participant is quoted for any event, all bets placed on that event shall be void. In the event of any malfunction to the UWIN gaming system, failed transmission or other technical issues or suspected fraud UWIN reserves the right to void any and/or all bets placed.

Notwithstanding any other provision in these Terms and Conditions, UWIN reserves the right, in our absolute discretion, to decline all, or part, of any bet placed without providing any reason whatsoever.

We only accept bets made through the internet and/or Devices in compliance with these Terms and Conditions. Bets are not accepted in any other form (whether by post, email, fax or otherwise) and where received will be void regardless of the outcome.

Subject to the other provisions herein, bets will be deemed to be validly placed by you if your username and password have been entered correctly, subject always to there being sufficient available funds in your account.

You are responsible and liable for all activities and transactions that take place through the use of any of the following (or any combination thereof):

your name;

your account number;

your username and password; regardless of whether the use of the foregoing was authorized by you or not.

It is your sole responsibility to ensure that the details of your bets are correct and that you understand the terms of  the bet registration including any rules applicable to the bet before you confirm placing of the bet and in this regard you may wish to review your bet for mistakes before it is transmitted to us. Subject to the other provisions herein, once your bets have been placed and their acceptance confirmed by us, they may not be cancelled, revoked or changed by you and shall be deemed to be conclusive evidence in respect of the bets that you have placed.

It should be noted that all bets are logged and recorded in the transaction log database. UWIN's transaction logs shall be conclusive evidence of all transactions and times at which the transactions are placed.

Subject to the requirement for payment to be received by us prior to a bet being deemed to be placed (and if this is not received then we reserve the right to void the bet) and the other provisions herein, bets will be deemed valid and accepted by UWIN when a transaction ID is displayed on your screen and duly reflected in your transaction history.

No betting is permitted after any deadline set by us, the commencement of an event and/or where the outcome of an event is known at the time of placement of your bet. If any event is erroneously left open for betting after the commencement of the event and/or where the outcome of an event is known, UWIN reserves the right to decline or void such bets placed without reference to you. Acceptance of any bet or any part thereof shall be at the sole discretion of UWIN. For the avoidance of doubt, this clause does not prohibit "in play" or "half time" bets where allowed by UWIN.

Advertised start times of the events displayed on the Website(s) are for information purposes only. If for any reason a bet is inadvertently accepted by UWIN after an event or match has commenced other than "in play" or "half time" bets where accepted by UWIN, UWIN reserves the right to cancel and void such bet.

Unless stated otherwise within the rules for each sport or event, the result of a match or event will be determined on the day of its conclusion for betting purposes. Any subsequent enquiry that may result in an overturned decision will not be recognized by UWIN, and original settlement of bets will stand.

If the venue for a sporting event is changed, all bets placed based on the original venue shall at the sole discretion of UWIN be voidable by us.

The winner of an event or game will be determined on the date of the event's conclusion according to the House Betting Rules.

UWIN does not recognize suspended games, protests or overturned decisions for betting purposes.

Should you include a non-runner or void selection in a multiple bet, the bet will be settled on the remaining valid selections only.

You acknowledge that any and all odds, lines and handicaps are subject to fluctuation without notice, and the foregoing will become fixed only at the time of acceptance of the bet by us.

Where a manifest error, mistake or system failure deriving from UWIN results in an incorrect odd, line or handicap taken in a bet, the bet, or that part of the bet if it is a multiple bet/parlay sought to be placed with UWIN will be void. Provided the error, mistake or failure is rectified in time, UWIN may in our absolute discretion (but shall not be obliged to) make reasonable efforts to contact you to allow the choice of placing another bet at the correct odds, lines and handicaps.

We will not accept any simultaneously placed bets on one event from you.

In respect of any bet and the associated transactions therewith, the decision of UWIN is final and conclusive.

When the player wishes to place a bet using Indonesian Rupiah, the player shall place his bet by eliminating the last three (3) zeros from his desired stake. All bets shall be in multiples of one thousand. For easy reference, please see the following examples:

Once the player types the amount in accordance with the abovementioned rules, the system automatically recognizes that three (3) zeros shall be added to the amount of stake in order to determine the true amount of stake desired by the player.

Customers must register their bet request as individuals. Repeated requests containing the same selections from the same or different customers may be subsequently deemed where we believe the customers are acting in collusion or as part of a syndicate and/or identical or similar bet requests are registered within a short time of each other and dealt with us accordingly.

Settlement of Transactions

When using a credit or debit card or effecting a bank transfer, the cardholder's or account holder’s name as appropriate must be the same as the Name. UWIN reserves the right not to settle a transaction in the event of discrepancies between the cardholder's or account holder’s name and the Name.

You are fully responsible for paying all monies owed to UWIN and/or other players (as the case may be). In respect of any payment made by you, you agree that you will not make or procure the making of any charge-backs and/or deny or reverse any such payment, and that you will reimburse UWIN for any charge-backs, denials or reversal of payments as well as any and all losses suffered and expenses incurred by UWIN as a consequence thereof. UWIN may, at our sole and absolute discretion, cease to provide services or payment to certain users or to users paying with certain credit or debit cards or by bank transfers from certain banks.

The maximum winnings payable by UWIN to any member on any valid accepted Sportsbook bet placed with UWIN shall be limited to GBP£100,000 (or equivalent) per bet or the maximum payout by the individual bet types whichever is lower. The maximum amount of each bet varies according to the specific bet type offered on the mini bet list offered from time to time on the Service and is subject to change without prior notice but in any event will not exceed the available funds in your account.

Your possible winnings may be quoted exclusive of bet amount and this should be considered when placing your bet.

All your winnings will be credited to your account. UWIN shall not in any way be responsible or liable to you for any funds/winnings credited to an account in error, and UWIN reserves the right to void any transactions involving such funds, either at the time or retrospectively. Should funds be credited to your account in error it is your responsibility to inform UWIN without delay and such funds are not to be used by you and we reserve the right to withdraw such funds and void any transactions placed using them. Funds deposited in one account will not be transferred to another account.

Payment of any taxes, fees, charges or levies that may apply to your winnings under any applicable laws shall be your sole responsibility.

Collection of Winnings

Your winnings from settled bets are credited to your account and shall be withdrawn in accordance with our withdrawal policy including where applicable but not limited to provision of a copy of valid photographic identification, satisfactory verification of address and/or credit/debit card or bank account to our satisfaction.

Where your card issuer allows, your winnings may be credited to the credit or debit card account which was used for the original placement of the deposit. A cheque or bank wire will only be issued in the Name, and where a deposit has been made by credit or debit card this must also be the same as the name of the registered cardholder. We reserve the right to limit the number of cards or bank accounts used by you.

A turnover of at least 1 time on the value of deposit needs to be reached before a withdrawal can be requested. UWIN reserves the right to make a charge to your account to cover all reasonable cost relating to both the deposit and withdrawal.

All bank charges that UWIN incurs arising from or in connection with any of your betting transactions shall be borne and reimbursed by you and UWIN is entitled to deduct and offset the foregoing from the winnings payable to you or from your account, as the case may be.

UWIN does not undertake to advise you that you have an outstanding balance to collect. If you do not access your account by logging onto the Website(s) and using the services offered for any consecutive period of 6 months and above your account will be deemed inactive. We shall be entitled to charge you periodic administrative fees during the period that your account remains inactive and set off such charges against funds in the account up to the extent of your account balance. If an inactive account is identified, we may attempt to contact the account holder via telephone, email or written communications, using the contact details registered with the account. If this fails, we may use other methods at our disposal to seek to contact the account holder. If such efforts prove unsuccessful and contact with the customer cannot be established within twelve months of the date from which the account was identified as 'dormant', any outstanding bankroll in such account may be set aside and we shall reserve the power to close the account and designate at our discretion that the outstanding bankroll may be  taken by us and pooled towards applicable gambling duty or allocated along with other dormant funds to a gambling charity.

We recognize and respect your right to privacy. Keeping your data safe is our paramount concern.

We will keep all of your personal data private and will not disclose this information to any third party unless required to do so by applicable laws and regulations or a court order; with the exception that we reserve the right to disclose and transfer your personal data to our respective payment settlement service providers and financial institutions to the extent necessary for the completion of payments for services provided through our website.

All personal information supplied by users is transmitted via Secure Socket (SSL 128 bit encryption Standard) and is stored in secure operating environments that are not accessible by the public. Internal access to all data is limited and strictly monitored.

UWIN and our partner may contact you via email about offers which may be of interest to you. It is UWIN’s policy not to share any personally-identifying material obtained through UWIN’s web sites with any third party.

Disclaimer

Fraud alert: Infringe of trademark

UWIN prides itself as a reliable and responsible online gaming company. And for the past 10 years, it continues to uphold its main objective to protect customer rights, adhering to industry rules and regulations, and improving quality of customer journey from registration to after sales. 

The company undergoes tedious security checks to not only provide its customers an enjoyable experience but also a safe place to play and transact in. 

Due to the overwhelming support from customers, UWIN continues to grow in magnitude. However, since dissatisfied customers cannot be avoided in any business or industry, counterfeit trademarks in the market exist. This seriously damages UWIN’s image, confusing and cheating valuable customers. 

Thus, UWIN shares a public statement for clarification purposes, that the company is in no way associated with UWIN casino. UWIN does not take responsibility in any transaction with the mentioned company. UWIN is currently taking necessary actions to prosecute UWIN casino's criminal actions.

Please be careful and trust only UWIN’s official website and channels. Should you encounter or in possession of any relevant information on the mentioned fraudulent company, feel free to contact UWIN Customer Service (link). Your report is highly appreciated.  Rest assured that UWIN strives to deliver the best quality products and services, with secured and fair transactions. With your help and consideration, we hope to stop fraudulent activities as soon as possible. Thank you. 
Sincerely, 
UWIN Team

CYBERGAMING RULES

All bets on the total of rounds for Counter-Strike shall be accepted with overtimes taken into account.

If one of the players (or team) is removed from the match (for whatever reason), all remaining rounds/cards will be considered a loss.

In the event that a game is carried over more than 36 hours, bets on the match shall be subject to return at a coefficient of 1. In the event that a match is stopped by the referees and a rematch is decreed, the results of the match cancelled will not be taken into account.

TYPES OF CYBERGAMING OUTCOMES

Match Winner In the proposed twos/couples one names a participant who will go on in the tournament grid. If both participants have left the tournament, the best shall be the participant who has gone furthest in the tournament grid. If both participants have been eliminated in the same round, the coefficient of winnings on the bets shall be equal to “1”. In the event that a participant refuses to enter a tournament before it begins, the coefficient of winnings on the bets shall be equal to “1”.

The winner is considered that participant who took first place in the tournament. In the event that a participant refuses to enter the tournament before it begins, the coefficient of winnings on bets made on that participant shall be “1”.

First Blood bet – one must determine which of the teams will first defeat a rival player.

First Roshan bet – one must determine which of the teams will defeat Roshan first.

Round Length bet – one must determine whether the round will last for shorter or longer than the proposed time in minutes. Only the integer value of the minutes played is taken into account, that is, seconds are not taken into account. The handicap, individual total, and even/odd round total is shown in “deaths” unless the line specifies otherwise. A “death” shall mean the death of a character for any reason (killed by enemy characters, Roshan, creeps, etc.).

LIVE BETS

Live bets are bets taken during an event and only for outcomes, the results of which are still undetermined. Live bets are offered in the special section “Live bets”

1. COEFFICIENT IN LIVE BETS The coefficient for events changes in real time. The coefficient can rise or fall in the period between the choice of the bet and its acceptance, which may influence the value of winnings. The coefficient for these bets changes gradually to reflect the development of events in the match

2. RESULTS FOR LIVE BETS The results of “Live” bets, on the basis of which bets are calculated, are the results that become known immediately after the end of the event. All subsequent changes will not be taken into account when deciding the proposed “Live” bets.

UWIN carries out the calculation of “Live” bets on the basis of its own statistical data on the actual course of the game. Unless otherwise stated, in “Live” bets all bets on athletes not participating in the competition shall be considered null and void. For outcomes, the results of which become known during the match, the calculation of bets, if possible, shall be carried out directly upon the completion of the event.

All bets the outcome of which was defined in “Live” mode (in particular, bets on who will win a certain segment of the match or whether the total will consist of “more”), shall be considered valid and are calculated even in the event that the tournament or event was interrupted.

Claims for bets made on a Live event shall be taken into consideration within 24 hours from the start of the event. If the match is interrupted or is not completed within 36 hours, the bets calculated up to this moment shall not be subject to recalculation. For outcomes, the results of which are not clearly defined, which have not taken place and/or have not been fully completed, the coefficient of winnings on bets shall be equal to “1” (return of bet).
